BundleTooltipDecorator.Description: Marks items that are needed for the bundles
BundleTooltipDecorator.DecorateLockedBun: Displays bundle decorator for still locked bundles
BundleTooltipDecorator.DecorateUnqualifi: Displays bundle decorator for item that doesn't meet quality requirement
FieldOfficeDecorator.Description: Marks items that are needed for the island field office
RarecrowDecorator.Description: Marks items that are needed for the rarecrow collection
SeedTooltipDecorator.Description: Preview the seed product and its sell value
SellPriceDisplayable.Description: Adds the sell price at the bottom of the tooltip
MuseumDecorator.Description: Marks items that are needed for the museum
NewRecipeDisplayable.Description: Marks recipes that where not yet cooked / crafted
ShippingBinDecorator.Description: Marks items that were not shipped yet
AnimalTooltipGenerator.Description: Displays additional information for farm animals
CropTooltipGenerator.Description: A tooltip that displays the type of crop and remaining days till harvest
Displays soil fertilizer on crop tooltip
FruitTreeTooltipGenerator.Description: A tooltip that displays the type of fruit tree and remaining days till harvest
TeaBushTooltipGenerator.Description: A tooltip that displays the remaining days of tea bush
MachineTooltipGenerator.Description: A tooltip that displays the type of result and remaining time
TreeTooltipGenerator.Description: A tooltip that displays the type of tree
TreeTooltipGenerator.ShowGrowthStage.Des: Displays tree growth stage(in numeric form)
